long_description: A quick-drying, stretchy pair of pants for yoga, the women's Roxanne Printed Leggings from prAna take an elegant step away from the ordinary with a fun print design. The fitted prAna women's Roxanne leggings offer a 27 in. inseam and a mid rise. Stretch performance jersey; wide waistband offers flattering fit; elastic inside waistband; gusset for added comfort.
short_description: A quick-drying, stretchy pair of pants for yoga, the women's Roxanne Printed Leggings from prAna take an elegant step away from the ordinary with a fun print design.
